Source.Name: xwayland-satellite
Source.Description: Grants rootless Xwayland integration to any Wayland compositor implementing xdg_wm_base and viewporter. This is particularly useful for compositors that (understandably) do not want to go through implementing support for rootless Xwayland themselves.
